size.description: The object's rough size in centimeters

hardness.description: The object's hardness on the Moh's hardness scale

mass.description: The object's mass in grams -- 450 grams is about 1 pound

concealment.description: The max size object this object can conceal/require inspection to see

appearances.description: The possible ASCII/Unicode single-character appearance of this node -- multiple means random

colors.description: The possible ACSII/Unicode colors of this node -- multiple means random

health.description: The health of this object;  when 0, the object 'dies'.

s_death.description: The sound-folder/volume played on the object's death.
